SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.1_0: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpy ahetutaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.1_1: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kva cana ke cana //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.3_0: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.4_1: pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ kriyāvantaś ca santy uta //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.5_1: yāvan notpadyata ime tāvan nāpratyayāḥ katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.6_1: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataś ca pratyayena kim //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.7_0: na san nāsan na sad asan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.7_1: kathaṃ nirvartako hetur evaṃ sati hi yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.9_1: nānantaram ato yuktaṃ niruddhe pratyayaś ca kaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.10_0: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.11_0: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣvasti tat phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.11_1: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tac ca bhaven na pratyayeṣu yat //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_1.12_0: athāsad api tat tebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.1_0: gataṃ na gamyate tāvad agataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.2_0: ceṣṭā yatra gatis tatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.2_1: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatis tataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.4_1: ṛte gater gamyamānaṃ gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.5_1: yena tad gamyamānaṃ ca yac cātra gamanaṃ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.8_0: gantā na gacchati tāvad agantā naiva gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.8_1: anyo gantur agantuś ca kas tṛtīyo 'tha gacchati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.10_0: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.10_1: gamanena vinā gantā gantur gamanam icchataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.11_0: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.11_1: ganteti cājyate yena gantā san yac ca gacchati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.13_0: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhād gamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.14_0: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kim agataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.15_0: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvad agantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.15_1: anyo gantur agantuś ca kas tṛtīyo 'tha tiṣṭhati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.17_0: na tiṣṭhati gamyamānān na gatān nāgatād api /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.17_1: gamanaṃ saṃpravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś ca gateḥ samā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.18_0: yad eva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.18_1: anya eva punar gantā gater iti na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.19_0: yad eva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhaved yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.19_1: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.20_0: anya eva punar gantā gater yadi vikalpyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.20_1: gamanaṃ syād ṛte gantur gantā syād gamanād ṛte //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.21_0: ekībhāvena vā siddhir nānābhāvena vā yayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.21_1: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.22_0: gatyā yayājyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.22_1: yasmān na gatipūrvo 'sti kaścid kiṃcid dhi gacchati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.23_0: gatyā yayājyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.23_1: gatī dve nopapadyete yasmād eke tu gantari //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.24_0: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_2.25_1: tasmād gatiś ca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.1_0: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.2_0: svam ātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tat tam eva na paśyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.2_1: na paśyati yad ātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tat parān //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.4_0: nāpaśyamānaṃ bhavati yadā kiṃ cana darśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.4_1: darśanaṃ paśyatīty evaṃ katham etat tu yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.5_0: paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyaty adarśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.6_0: draṣṭā nāsty atiraskṛtya tiraskṛtya ca darśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.6_1: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭary asati te kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_3.9_0: vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.2_1: āhetukaṃ na cāsty arthaḥ kaścid āhetukaḥ kva cit //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.3_0: rūpeṇa tu vinirmuktaṃ yadi syād rūpakāraṇam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.3_1: akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syād nāsty akāryaṃ ca kāraṇam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.4_0: rūpe saty eva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.5_1: tasmād rūpagatān kāṃścin na vikalpān vikalpayet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.6_0: na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryam ity upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.7_1: sarveṣām eva bhāvānāṃ rūpeṇaiva samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.8_0: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_4.9_0: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.1_1: alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syāt pūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.2_0: alakṣaṇo na kaścic ca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kva cit /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.2_1: asaty alakṣaṇe bhāve kramatāṃ kuha lakṣaṇam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.5_0: tasmān na vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.7_0: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.8_0: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_5.8_1: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.1_0: rāgād yadi bhavet pūrvaṃ rakto rāgatiraskṛtaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.1_1: taṃ pratītya bhaved rāgo rakte rāgo bhavet sati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.2_0: rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.2_1: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'py eṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.3_0: sahaiva punar udbhūtir na yuktā rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.4_0: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tat saha /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.5_0: ekatve sahabhāvaś cet syāt sahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.5_1: pṛthaktve sahabhāvaś cet syāt sahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.6_0: pṛthaktve sahabhāvaś ca yadi kiṃ rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.8_0: pṛthag na sidhyatīty evaṃ sahabhāvaṃ vikāṅkṣasi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.10_0: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhir na saha nāsaha /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_6.10_1: rāgavat sarvadharmāṇāṃ siddhir na saha nāsaha //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.1_0: yadi saṃskṛta utpādas tatra yuktā trilakṣaṇī /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.2_1: saṃskṛtasya samastāḥ syur ekatra katham ekadā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.3_1: asti ced anavasthaivaṃ nāsti cet te na saṃskṛtāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.5_1: maulenājanitas taṃ te sa kathaṃ janayiṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.6_0: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.6_1: maulaḥ sa tenājanitas tam utpādayate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.7_0: ayam utpādyamānas te kāmam utpādayed imam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.9_1: kiṃ prakāśayate dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.10_1: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.11_0: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.13_1: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.15_0: utpadyamānam utpattāv idaṃ na kramate yadā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.16_0: pratītya yad yad bhavati tat tac chāntaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.16_1: tasmād utpadyamānaṃ ca śāntam utpattir eva ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.17_0: yadi kaścid anutpanno bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kva cit /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.17_1: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.18_1: utpādayet tam utpādam utpādaḥ katamaḥ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.20_0: sataś ca tāvad utpattir asataś ca na yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.20_1: na sataś cāsataś ceti pūrvam evopapāditam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.21_1: yaś cānirudhyamānas tu sa bhāvo nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.22_0: nāsthitas tiṣṭhate bhāvaḥ sthito bhāvo na tiṣṭhati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.22_1: na tiṣṭhate tiṣṭhamānaḥ ko 'nutpannaś ca tiṣṭhati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.23_1: yaś cānirudhyamānas tu sa bhāvo nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.24_1: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.25_0: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.26_1: tathā nirudhyamānaṃ ca kim ajātaṃ nirudhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.30_0: sataś ca tāvad bhāvasya nirodho nopapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.30_1: ekatve na hi bhāvaś ca nābhāvaś copapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.31_1: na dvitīyasya śirasaś chedanaṃ vidyate yathā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.32_0: na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.34_0: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_7.34_1: tathotpādas tathā sthānaṃ tathā bhaṅga udāhṛtam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.1_0: sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.2_0: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syād akartṛkam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.2_1: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syād akarmakaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.3_1: ahetukaṃ bhavet karma kartā cāhetuko bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.4_0: hetāv asati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.4_1: tadabhāve kriyā kartā kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.5_1: dharme cāsaty adharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.7_0: kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaḥ sadasat kurute na tat /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.7_1: parasparaviruddhaṃ hi sac cāsac caikataḥ kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.8_0: satā ca kriyate nāsan nāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.8_1: kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣās tatra ta eva hi //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.9_0: nāsadbhūtaṃ na sadbhūtaḥ sadasadbhūtam eva vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.9_1: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.10_1: karoti kārakaḥ karma pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.11_0: karoti sadasadbhūto na san nāsac ca kārakaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.11_1: karma tat tu vijānīyāt pūrvoktair eva hetubhiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.12_0: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.13_0: evaṃ vidyād upādānaṃ vyutsargād iti karmaṇaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_8.13_1: kartuś ca karmakartṛbhyāṃ śeṣān bhāvān vibhāvayet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.1_1: bhavanti yasya prāg ebhyaḥ so 'stīty eke vadantyuta //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.2_1: bhāvasya tasmāt prāg ebhyaḥ so 'sti bhāvo vyavasthitaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.3_1: yaḥ prāg vyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.4_1: amūny api bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.5_0: ajyate kenacit kaścit kiṃcit kena cid ajyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.5_1: kutaḥ kiṃcid vinā kaścit kiṃcit kiṃcid vinā kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.6_0: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyaḥ kaścit pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.7_0: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.7_1: ekaikasmāt kathaṃ pūrvo darśanādeḥ sa vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.8_0: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.8_1: ekaikasmād bhavet pūrvam evaṃ caitan na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.9_0: draṣṭānya eva śrotānyo vedako 'nyaḥ punar yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.9_1: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.10_1: bhavanti yebhyas teṣv eṣa bhūteṣv api na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.11_1: na vidyate ced yasya sa na vidyanta imāny api //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.12_0: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_9.12_1: na vidyate 'sti nāstīti nivṛttās tatra kalpanāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.1_0: yad indhanaṃ sa ced agnir ekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.1_1: anyaś ced indhanād agnir indhanād apy ṛte bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.4_0: tatraitat syād idhyamānam indhanaṃ bhavatīti cet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.4_1: kenedhyatām indhanaṃ tat tāvanmātram idaṃ yadā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.5_0: anyo na prāpsyate 'prapto na dhakṣyaty adahan punaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.5_1: na nirvāsyaty anirvāṇaḥ sthāsyate vā svaliṅgavān //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.6_0: anya evandhanād agnir indhanaṃ prāpnuyād yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.6_1: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaś ca striyaṃ yathā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.7_0: anya evendhanād agnir indhanaṃ kāmam āpnuyāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.10_0: yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvas tam evāpekṣya sidhyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.10_1: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kam apekṣya kaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.11_1: athāpy apekṣate siddhas tv apekṣāsya na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.13_0: āgacchaty anyato nāgnir indhane 'gnir na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.14_0: indhanaṃ punar agnir na nāgnir anyatra cendhanāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.14_1: nāgnir indhanavān nāgnāv indhanāni na teṣu saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_10.16_0: ātmanaś ca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.1_0: pūrvā prajñāyate koṭir nety uvāca mahāmuniḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.2_0: naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.3_0: pūrvaṃ jātir yadi bhavej jarāmaraṇam uttaram /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.3_1: nirjarā maraṇā jātir bhavej jāyeta cāmṛtaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.4_0: paścāj jātir yadi bhavej jarāmaraṇam āditaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.5_0: na jarāmaraṇaṃ caiva jātiś ca saha yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.6_1: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ taj jarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.7_0: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.7_1: vedanā vedakaś caiva santy arthā ye ca ke cana //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.8_0: pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_11.8_1: sarveṣām api bhāvānāṃ pūrvā koṭī na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.1_0: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtam ahetukam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.1_1: duḥkham ity eka icchanti tac ca kāryaṃ na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.2_0: svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavet pratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.2_1: skandhān imān amī skandhāḥ saṃbhavanti pratītya hi //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.3_0: yady amībhya ime 'nye syur ebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.3_1: bhavet parakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ parair ebhir amī kṛtāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.4_0: svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ punar vinā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.4_1: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.5_1: pareṇa kṛtvā tad duḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.6_1: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.7_1: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yat kuryāt tat tasya syāt svayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.8_0: na tāvat svakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tat kṛtam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.8_1: paro nātmakṛtaś cet syād duḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.9_0: syād ubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syād ekaikakṛtaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.10_0: na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_12.10_1: bāhyānām api bhāvānāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.1_0: tan mṛṣā moṣadharma yad bhagavān ity abhāṣata /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.1_1: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārās tena te mṛṣā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.2_0: tan mṛṣā moṣadharma yad yadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.3_1: nāsvabhāvaś ca bhāvo 'sti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.4_0: kasya syād anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvaś cen na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.4_1: kasya syād anyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.5_1: yuvā na jīryate yasmād yasmāj jīrṇo na jīryate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.6_0: tasya ced anyathābhāvaḥ kṣīram eva bhaved dadhi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.7_0: yady aśūnyaṃ bhavet kiṃcit syāc chūnyam iti kiṃ cana /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.7_1: na kiṃcid asty aśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_13.8_1: yeṣāṃ tu śūnyatādṛṣṭis tān asādhyān babhāṣire //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.1_0: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇy etāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.1_1: sarvaśaś ca na saṃsargam anyonyena vrajanty uta //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.2_0: evaṃ rāgaś ca raktaś ca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.2_1: traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśāś ca śeṣāṇy āyatanāni ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.3_0: anyenānyasya saṃsargas tac cānyatvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.3_1: draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ yan na saṃsargaṃ vrajanty ataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.4_0: na ca kevalam anyatvaṃ draṣṭavyāder na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.5_0: anyad anyat pratītyānyan nānyad anyad ṛte 'nyataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.5_1: yat pratītya ca yat tasmāt tad anyan nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.6_0: yady anyad anyad anyasmād anyasmād apy ṛte bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.6_1: tad anyad anyad anyasmād ṛte nāsti ca nāsty ataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.7_1: avidyamāne cānyatve nāsty anyad vā tad eva vā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.8_0: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_14.8_1: saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.2_0: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.2_1: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.4_1: svabhāve parabhāve ca sati bhāvo hi sidhyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.5_0: bhāvasya ced aprasiddhir abhāvo naiva sidhyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.5_1: bhāvasya hy anyathābhāvam abhāvaṃ bruvate janāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.6_0: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.6_1: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.8_0: yady astitvaṃ prakṛtyā syān na bhaved asya nāstitā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.9_1: prakṛtau kasya vā satyām anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.11_0: asti yad dhi svabhāvena na tan nāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_15.11_1: nāstīdānīm abhūt pūrvam ity ucchedaḥ prasajyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.1_0: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cen na nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.1_1: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'py eṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.3_1: vibhavaś cānupādānaḥ kaḥ sa kiṃ saṃsariṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.4_0: saṃskārāṇāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ cid upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.4_1: sattvasyāpi na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ cid upapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.5_1: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavat sattvo badhyate na na mucyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.6_0: bandhanaṃ ced upādānaṃ sopādāno na badhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.7_0: badhnīyād bandhanaṃ kāmaṃ bandhyāt pūrvaṃ bhaved yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.7_1: na cāsti tac cheṣam uktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.8_0: baddho na mucyate tāvad abaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_16.10_1: yatra kas tatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.1_1: maitraṃ sa dharamas tad bījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.3_0: tatra yac cetanety uktaṃ karma tan mānasaṃ smṛtam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.3_1: cetayitvā ca yat tūktaṃ tat tu kāyikavācikam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.5_1: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.6_0: tiṣṭhaty ā pākakālāc cet karma tan nityatām iyāt /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.6_1: niruddhaṃ cen niruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.7_1: tataḥ phalam ṛte bījāt sa ca nābhipravartate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.8_0: bījāc ca yasmāt saṃtānaḥ saṃtānāc ca phalodbhavaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.8_1: bījapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmān nocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.9_1: tataḥ phalam ṛte cittāt sa ca nābhipravartate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.10_0: cittāc ca yasmāt saṃtānaḥ saṃtānāc ca phalodbhavaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.10_1: karmapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmān nocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.11_1: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.12_0: bahavaś ca mahāntaś ca doṣāḥ syur yadi kalpanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.13_0: imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.14_1: caturvidho dhātutaḥ sa prakṛtyāvyākṛtaś ca saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.15_0: prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.16_0: prahāṇataḥ praheyaḥ syāt karmaṇaḥ saṃkrameṇa vā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.17_1: pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnām eka utpadyate tu saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.18_0: karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.19_0: phalavyatikramād vā sa maraṇād vā nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.19_1: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.20_0: śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraś ca na śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.21_0: karma notpadyate kasmān niḥsvabhāvaṃ yatas tataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.21_1: yasmāc ca tad anutpannaṃ na tasmād vipraṇaśyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.22_0: karma svabhāvataś cet syāc chāśvataṃ syād asaṃśayam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.22_1: akṛtaṃ ca bhavet karma kriyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.24_0: vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.25_0: tad vipakvavipākaṃ ca punar eva vipakṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.25_1: karma vyavasthitaṃ yasmāt tasmāt svābhāvikaṃ yadi //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.26_0: karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.26_1: na cet te tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāt tattvataḥ katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.27_0: karma kleśāś ca dehānāṃ pratyayāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.27_1: karma kleśāś ca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.28_1: sa bhoktā sa ca na kartur anyo na ca sa eva saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.29_1: asti yasmād idaṃ karma tasmāt kartāpi nāsty ataḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.30_0: karma cen nāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syāt karmajaṃ phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.30_1: asaty atha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.31_1: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.32_0: tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā yat karma tat kṛtam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_17.33_0: kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāś ca kartāraś ca phalāni ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.1_0: ātmā skandhā yadi bhaved udayavyayabhāg bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.2_0: ātmany asati cātmīyaṃ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.3_0: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaś ca so 'pi na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.3_1: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.4_0: mamety aham iti kṣīṇe bahirdhādhyātmam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.5_1: te prapañcāt prapañcas tu śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.6_0: ātmety api prajñapitam anātmety api deśitam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.6_1: buddhair nātmā na cānātmā kaścid ity api deśitam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.8_0: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyam eva ca /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_18.10_0: pratītya yad yad bhavati na hi tāvat tad eva tat /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.1_0: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca yady atītam apekṣya hi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.2_0: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca na stas tatra punar yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.2_1: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca syātāṃ katham apekṣya tam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.3_0: anapekṣya punaḥ siddhir nātītaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.3_1: pratyutpanno 'nāgataś ca tasmāt kālo na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.5_0: nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.5_1: yo gṛhyetāgṛhītaś ca kālaḥ prajñapyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.6_0: bhāvaṃ pratītya kālaś cet kālo bhāvād ṛte kutaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_19.6_1: na ca kaś cana bhāvo 'sti kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.1_0: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.1_1: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.2_0: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.2_1: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.3_0: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryām asti cet phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.3_1: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.4_0: hetoś ca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cet phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.4_1: hetavaḥ pratyayāś ca syur ahetupratyayaiḥ samāḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.5_0: hetuṃ phalasya dattvā ca yadi hetur nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.5_1: yad dattaṃ yan nirudhaṃ ca hetor ātmadvayaṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.6_0: hetuṃ phalasyādattvā ca yadi hetur nirudhyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.6_1: hetau niruddhe jātaṃ tat phalam āhetukaṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.7_0: phalaṃ sahaiva sāmagryā yadi prādurbhavet punaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.7_1: ekakālau prasajyete janako yaś ca janyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.8_0: pūrvam eva ca sāmagryāḥ phalaṃ prādurbhaved yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.9_0: niruddhe cet phalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.10_1: hetus tiṣṭhann api kathaṃ phalena janayed vṛtaḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.11_1: na hy adṛṣṭvā na dṛṣṭvāpi hetur janayate phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.12_0: nātītasya hy atītena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.12_1: nājātena na jātena saṃgatir jātu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.13_0: na jātasya hy ajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.13_1: nātītena na jātena saṃgatir jātu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.14_0: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.14_1: nājātena na naṣṭena saṃgatir jātu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.15_0: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.15_1: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.16_0: hetuḥ phalena śūnyaś cet kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.16_1: hetuḥ phalenāśūnyaś cet kathaṃ janayate phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.18_0: katham utpatsyate śūnyaṃ kathaṃ śūnyaṃ nirotsyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.18_1: śūnyam apy aniruddhaṃ tad anutpannaṃ prasajyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.19_0: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.19_1: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.20_1: pṛthaktve phalahetvoḥ syāt tulyo hetur ahetunā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.23_0: na ca pratyayahetūnām iyam ātmānam ātmanā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.23_1: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayet phalam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_20.24_1: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.1_0: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.1_1: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.2_0: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.2_1: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.3_1: na janma maraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.4_0: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.4_1: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācin na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.5_1: na janma maraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.6_0: sahānyonyena vā siddhir vinānyonyena vā yayoḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.6_1: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.7_1: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.8_0: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.8_1: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.10_0: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva naika ity upapadyate /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.10_1: saṃbhavo vibhavaś caiva na nānety upapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_21.11_0: dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva vibhavaś caiva te bhavet /

SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_22.1_0: skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /

SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_22.10_0: evaṃ śūnyam upādānam upādātā ca sarvaśaḥ /

SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_22.11_0: śūnyam iti na vaktavyam aśūnyam iti vā bhavet /

SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.14_0: adhvany anāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmīti darśanam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.14_1: na bhaviṣyāmi cety etad atītenādhvanā samam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.15_0: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaś ced evaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.15_1: anutpannaś ca devaḥ syāj jāyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.16_0: devād anyo manuṣyaś ced aśāśvatam ato bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.16_1: devād anyo manuṣyaś cet saṃtatir nopapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.17_0: divyo yady ekadeśaḥ syād ekdeśaś ca mānuṣaḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.17_1: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavet tac ca na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.18_0: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca prasiddham ubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.18_1: siddhe na śāśvataṃ kāmaṃ naivāśāśvatam ity api //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.19_0: kutaścid āgataḥ kaścit kiṃcid gacchet punaḥ kva cit /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.19_1: yadi tasmād anādis tu saṃsāraḥ syān na cāsti saḥ //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.20_0: nāsti cec chāśvataḥ kaścit ko bhaviṣyaty aśāśvataḥ /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.21_0: antavān yadi lokaḥ syāt paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.21_1: athāpy anantavāl lokaḥ paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.22_0: skandhānām eṣa saṃtāno yasmād dīpārciṣām iva /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.22_1: tasmān nānantavattvaṃ ca nāntavattvaṃ ca yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.23_0: pūrve yadi ca bhajyerann utpadyeran na cāpy amī /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.23_1: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemān atha loko 'ntavān bhavet //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.24_0: pūrve yadi na bhajyerann utpadyeran na cāpyamī /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.24_1: skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemāl loko 'nanto bhaved atha //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.25_0: antavān ekadeśaś ced ekadeśas tv anantavān /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.25_1: syād antavān anantaś ca lokas tac ca na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.26_1: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitan na yujyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.27_1: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśo naitad apy upapadyate //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.28_0: antavac cāpy anantaṃ ca prasiddham ubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.28_1: siddhe naivāntavat kāmaṃ naivānantavad ity api //
SA10nagmmk_u:mmk_27.29_1: kva kasya katamāḥ kasmāt saṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ //
